markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 7"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Planar Survival](/Feats.aspx?ID=819) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="General" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=78" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=144" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 264 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
Master in [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16)

</column>

---

You can Subsist using Survival on different planes, even those without resources or natural phenomena you normally need. For instance, you can forage for food even if the plane lacks food that could normally sustain you. A success on your check to Subsist can also reduce the damage dealt by the plane, at the GM’s discretion.
name: Planar Survival

text: <title level="1" right="Feat 7" pfs="Standard" > Planar Survival Source Core Rulebook pg. 264 4.0 Prerequisites Master in Survival --- You can Subsist using Survival on different planes, even those without resources or natural phenomena you normally need. For instance, you can forage for food even if the plane lacks food that could normally sustain you. A success on your check to Subsist can also reduce the damage dealt by the plane, at the GM’s discretion.
